item.description:
DCR (Dept of Conservation & Recreation) will lead a two-hour hike at 1 p.m. on Sunday, June 20 (Fathers' Day). Meet at the Shea rink parking lot, 651 Willard Street, Quincy. For more information, call the DCR Rangers at 617-698-1802.

Summer Discovery Hike with Dad
Meet at the Shea rink parking lot at 651 Willard Street in Quincy.
It’s Father’s Day and summer is about to begin! Join us for a three mile signs of summer discovery hike. Bring your dad
along for a wooded walk. Chickatawbut Road will be closed to traffic to encourage recreation on Sundays during the
summer. Ages 8 and up. 2 hours
item.name: Blue Hills walk
